title: The Wolf Man
brief_description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night. Lon Chaney Jr.’s turn as the werewolf has been hugely influential on Hollywood representations of the legendary monster, though it is actually the second Universal Pictures werewolf film. Six years earlier the less successful Werewolf of London was released in 1935.

Lon Chaney Jr.’s turn as the werewolf has been hugely influential on Hollywood representations of the legendary monster, though it is actually the second Universal Pictures werewolf film. Six years earlier the less successful Werewolf of London was released in 1935.
